name: Dreams vs Nightmares
description:
Have the best dream of your life.

(Trailer coming soon! Check the commens!)

Story:

You fall asleep and you end up in a dream. Your goal is to jump on platforms and reach the end. But it is not that simple. There are NIGHTMARE DEVILS shooting nightmares at you. You can get rid of them by shooting a bubble colored the same as the devil's horns. If a nightmare hits you, you get sent to a maze where you have to light up the DREAM CAMPFIRE to get back in the dream. If you don't manage to do it in time the alarm clock goes off and you wake up. You have to do it all over again. 

If you get stuck:

  • Remember: To kill a devil the color of the bullet has to match the color of devil's horns.
  • All jumps can be made.
  • If you land on a side of a platform and you get stuck a little, you can spam space bar and you will be boosted up.
  • The Dream Campfire is the one in screenshots 4-5.
  • If you forget the controls, you can alway hold TAB and it wil pause the game and show:
    • Controls
    • Settings
    • Objectives
  • Hint: The campfire is at the center of the maze.
  • Every time you get sent to the maze all the devils disappear. You can use that as a advantage.
  • Aiming at the campfire means holding the right mouse button and having crosshair on the campfire.

Idea:

Everything that is happening is not real. Either you loose or win the alarm wakes you up and you are at the same place you were. The goal is to have the best dream of your life. Enjoy your time in the dream and escape nightmares. You can be as creative as you want and break the dream (the game) how you like.

Objectives:

  • In a dream:
    • Jump on the platforms to get to the next checkpoint. To capture a checkpoint you have to touch it and surviva 20 seconds after that. Goal is to reach the finnish. There are Nightmare Devils who are flying around and shooting nightmares at you. You can get rid of them by shooting a bubble in the same color as the horns of the devil.
  • In a Nightmare:
    • If you get hit by a Nightmare, you will end up in a maze where you have to find the Dream campfire and light it up by aiming at it (holding right mouse button). If you don't manage to do it in time, the alarm clock will go off and you will wake up.

Controls:

WASD - move

SHIFT - sprint

SPACE - jump

Left click - shoot

Right click - aim

Alpha1 - pink bubbles

Alpha2 - yellow bubbles

Alpha3 - green bubbles
